name: DUPLEX
description: The Duplex model offers exceptional flexibility and profitability. Comprised of two independent units, each with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a dedicated garage, this 2,898 sq. ft. property is perfect for families, investors, or those seeking rental income. Each unit features 1,150 sq. ft. of living area with modern finishes and thoughtful design. The modern floor plan features bright open spaces, upgraded finishes, and thoughtful design throughout. Buy the entire duplex or choose to rent one or both units. With comfort, durability, and strong earning potential, this model is a compelling choice for smart buyers.
